info.title: Payaza Documentation
info.description: API reference for processing payments using Card, Bank Transfer, USSD, and QR Code methods.

tags.name: Transfers
tags.description: Transfers are transactions made from your Payaza account to beneficiaries. Merchants can instantly transfer funds from their available balance. For every transfer, you need to specify the amount and the beneficiary’s details. You become eligible to make transfers after you have been verified. (you sign up, finish account activation and KYC verification).

tags.name: Payaza Account
tags.description: This is our internal account that can be used to make payouts to other bank accounts, in single or in bulk. The Payaza account can also be used to receive settlements. It can also be used to track the transfer status of your transactions and check your balance instantly

tags.name: Sub Accounts
tags.description: This enables you to establish Sub Payaza accounts for your customers. Each sub-account comes with an assigned static virtual account, facilitating direct funding for individual accounts. Furthermore, the Main Payaza account can directly initiate funding for each sub-account. These sub-accounts serve the purpose of managing unique account positions or balances and facilitating disbursements from these positions to specified beneficiaries.

tags.name: EUR Transfers
tags.description: This endpoints enable you to create EUR subaccounts which can be used to make transfers as required .

transaction_type.description:
The type of account being transferred to.(Default is NGN). 
NGN == “nuban”, 
GHS == “mobile_money” or “ghipps”, 
UGX == “mobile_money” ,
TZS == “mobile_money” or “tiss”, 
KES == “mobile_money” or “kepss”, 
XOF == “mobile_money” or “wave”, 
XAF == “mobile_money”, 
ZAR == “RTC”

service_payload.description: It contains the details of the service payload.

transaction_pin.description: This is the merchant's unique transaction PIN

account_reference.description: The reference of the Payaza account. Please be advised that your Payaza Account possesses unique account references corresponding to each currency utilized.(This is available in the **“View Payaza Account Details”** API response body).

currency.description: The transfer currency code.e.g. NGN, GHS, TZS, UGX, KES, XAF, ZAR.

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code e.g. BEN,CIV,CMR. This is required for XOF payouts

payout_beneficiaries.description: It contains the details of the payout beneficiaries

credit_amount.description: The amount to be credited to this particular beneficiary.

account_number.description:
This is the account number of the beneficiary. 
For “nuban” transfer == 10 digits 
For “kepss” transfer == 10 digits 
For “mobile_money” == 12 digits for GHA, TZA, UGA, KEN, CMR and 13 digits for CIV, BEN (starting with the 3-digit country code) 
e,g.Ghana = 233xxxxxxxxx,
Kenya = 254xxxxxxxxx, 
Uganda = 256xxxxxxxxx, 
Tanzania = 255xxxxxxxxx, 
Cameroon = 237xxxxxxxxx, 
Benin = 229(01)xxxxxxxx, 
Cote D'ivoire = 225xxxxxxxxxx, etc..

account_name.description: This is the name of the beneficiary for the transfer.

bank_code.description: This is the beneficiary's bank code.

narration.description: Narration for the payout (This must be 25 characters or less with no special characters).

transaction_reference.description: This is the unique identifier generated for each transaction by the merchant.

sender.description: It contains the details of the sender.

service_payload.description: It contains the details of the service payload.

bank_code.description: The unique code of the bank

mainAccountPayazaReference.description: The Account reference of the main Payaza account.

name.description: The name of the sub-account being created.

country.description: The country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 format (e.g., NGA).

purpose.description: The purpose for opening the account.

certificate_of_incorporation.description: URL link to the certificate of incorporation.

mermat.description: URL link to company memorandum and articles of association.

consent.description: Whether the company consents to the account request.

main_account_payaza_reference.description: The main Payaza account reference number.

directors.description: List of directors with identification and proof of address.

id_file.description: URL to the director's ID document.

poa_file.description: URL to the Proof of Address document.

id_file.description: URL to the shareholder's ID document.

poa_file.description: URL to the shareholder's Proof of Address.

id_file.description: URL link to the user's ID document.

poa_file.description: URL link to the Proof of Address document.

poa_type.description: Type of proof of address (e.g. utilityBill)

transactionDateTime.description: Date and time of the transaction.

active.description: Whether the bank is currently active.

accountName.description: The name of the Payaza Account

virtualAccounts.description: List of virtual accounts linked to this main account.

data.description: List containing the newly created account details.

accountStatus.description: Current status of the account (e.g., ACTIVE).

businessFk.description: Foreign key linking to the main business entity.

payazaAccountReference.description: The Payaza reference ID for this sub-account.

virtualAccounts.description: List of virtual accounts attached to this sub-account.

accountName.description: Name attached to the virtual account.

bankCode.description: Bank code for the virtual account.

businessFk.description: Foreign key linking to the main business.

virtualAccounts.description: Virtual accounts linked to this sub-account.

message.example: EUR Account request has been submitted for review.

creationReference.description: Unique reference ID to track the status of the review.

data.description: List of account requests (Corporate or User).

post.description:
This endpoint initiates a transfer from your Payaza account to a bank account. > **Important Note:** > Transfers are only processed on business days between 8:00 AM and 5:00 PM.
Ensure your wallet is funded before initiating.

response_content.response_description: Transaction has been successfully submitted for processing

post.description: This endpoint fetches the account details.

get.description: This endpoint gets the details of a particular transaction by the reference.

parameters.name: transaction_reference
parameters.description: The unique identifier given to a particular transaction

get.description: This endpoint fetches the bank codes available for each country
This endpoint retrieves the Payaza account details for a merchant.
This endpoint returns the Payaza subaccount details.

parameters.description: The unique identifier given to a particular transaction
